dialogue.name: Hero
dialogue.dialogueText: Time to answer the call to adventure.

dialogue.name: Ally
dialogue.dialogueText: Do we have to? I would prefer if we could stay home...

dialogue.name: Ally
dialogue.dialogueText: I'm no being lazy, look let's just ask the mentor.

dialogue.name: Mentor
dialogue.dialogueText: Hello is it true that there is a quest afoot?
